TopicTitle: Reapers Dutch Designs (my last plane before 1.0.5 i think)

Articles.Content:
hey guys here is the plane i made around my new copit.

i cant get in to my imgur so no picks for now.

but her is a video (so at lot of pics and sound )

the craftfile:

That is legit. Does this happen to draw inspiration from ACE Online's Sonic Binder and Ace Combat 3's COFFIN system?

The cockpit design is something I might have to do on my Harbinger when 1.0.5 is out. The wannabe Learjet cockpit is going to ruin its "high speed, high altitude" appearance, at least until I make a separate craft with the old cockpit when the mod for it shows up.

Edited November 8, 2015 by Spoot Knight
